import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../assets/css/Login.css"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import baseUrl from "../../baseUrl"; const CreateProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [currentTag, setCurrentTag] = useState('flower') const [error, setError] = useState({ show: false, title: "" }) const [data, setData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", tag: "", }) const handleSubmit = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() if(error.show === true){ setError(false) } if(!data.primaryImg){ setError({...error, show: true, title: "Primary Image cannot be empty" }) } if(e.target.title.value.length <= 5){ setError({...error, show: true, title: "Title cannot be empty or too small"}) }else{ setData({...data, title: e.target.title.value}) } if(e.target.description.value.length <= 5){ setError({...error, show: true, title: "Description cannot be empty or too small"}) }else{ setData({...data, description: e.target.description.value}) } const response = await fetch(`${baseUrl}`) } console.log(data) const handleChange = (e) => { const imgg = e.target.files[0] if(imgg){ let formData = {...data} formData[e.target.name] = imgg setData(formData) } } const handleTag = (tag) => { setCurrentTag(tag) }; const handleCancel = () => { navigate("/dashboard"); }; console.log(data) return (

Create Product

{currentTag==='flower' ? null : (
)}
); }; export default CreateProduct;
